attributes.action: Oppose the petition calling for a 2nd referendum that has 300,000+ signatures
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to uphold common sense and the democratic right of those who have chosen to vote for Britain to leave the EU
attributes.background:
On 23/06/2016, the voting majority cast their vote to exit the European Union.
In the sense of true democracy, those votes should be respected and the democratic process should not be undermined by those seeking to try and over-rule it!
